game.name: DCS: Mosquito FB VI
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: One of the most revolutionary and effective combat aircraft of WWII, the British de Havilland Mosquito was in service with the Royal Air Force (RAF) from 1940 to 1961.
game.shortDescriptionEn: One of the most revolutionary and effective combat aircraft of WWII, the British de Havilland Mosquito was in service with the Royal Air Force (RAF) from 1940 to 1961.
